To send cryptocurrency to another Ndax user using the mobile website, follow these steps:

  1. Log in at ndax.io.
  2. Tap the Ndax logo in the top left-hand corner.
  3. Select Wallet from the sidebar menu.
  4. Select the cryptocurrency you want to send.
  5. Tap the gray up arrow (Send) button at the bottom of the screen.
  6. Scroll down to the Send to a Friend section.
  7. Tap Transfer Funds.
  8. Enter the recipient’s email address associated with their Ndax account.
  9. Enter the amount of crypto you want to send, or tap Max to send your full available balance.
  10. Enter a message for the recipient (optional).
  11. Check Send as a Gift if this is intended as a gift.
  12. Select an event from the drop-down menu (required when sending as a gift).
  13. Tap Send.
  14. Enter your six-digit 2FA code from your authenticator app.

✅ If the email entered does not match an existing Ndax account, the recipient will receive an email invitation to sign up.
Once they register, the funds will appear in their account in a pending state. They will not be able to buy, sell, deposit, or withdraw the funds until they are fully verified.
